about_the_game:
Set in a decaying research facility, now overrun by a fungal infestation,You wake up alone in a control room and must navigate the corrupted corridors to explore the environment where every step is a risk.

FESTERED delivers a unique take on survival horror game genre by blending retro aesthetics with modern mechanics. Its shifting environments, permadeath, and oppressive atmosphere create a tense experience where every decision matters, and the infection warps both the facility and your perception."


  • Retro Survival Horror: Experience the tension of PSX/PS1-style graphics and a haunting retro soundtrack.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Each playthrough offers unique challenges with randomly generated environments.

  • Tense Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in an oppressive, fear-filled environment where every shadow hides a new threat.

  • Unique Tools and Items: Discover and utilize a variety of tools and items strategically placed throughout the facility to aid your escape.

  • Permadeath Mechanics: With only three lives, every decision is critical.

    Detailed Description

    Awakened in the forsaken Orion Laboratory, you find yourself in a nightmare. The facility, once a pinnacle of science, is now overrun by a horrific fungal infestation and nightmarish creatures. Your only sanctuary is the control room, but to survive, you must venture into the darkened halls, scavenging for supplies and uncovering the grim history of the experiments gone wrong.

    Equipped with a hazmat suit, you must explore the ever-changing layout of Orion Laboratory, evading or confronting the horrors that lurk within. The command terminal offers fragments of the past and vital clues for survival, but the threats are relentless and unforgiving. With only three lives, every choice could mean life or death.

    Festered delivers a gripping survival horror experience. Can you escape the festering nightmare, or will you become another victim of the horrors within?

    Welcome to FESTERED. Welcome to your nightmare.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains non-realistic depictions of violence, and frequent scary imagery.
